NG wiki

统一说明

  • 如接口无单独指明请求方式，所有接口使用post请求
  • 测试域名: http://1609217uc2.iask.in/
  • 每个接口必传参数
参数名 参数值 选项
uid 用户 如果用户登录，用户相关接口必传
token 用户标识 如果用户登录，用户相关接口必传（上线后）
device_id 设备号 选传
client ios / android 选传

获取服务器当前时间戳

  • 地址： timestamp
  • 请求方式：GET
  • 传参：无
  • 返回值：
1481853672

获取启动页广告

  • 地址： api/startad
  • 传参：无
  • 返回值：
{
    "error_code": 0,
    "message": "请求成功",
    "data": {
            "title": "启动页广告",
            "cover": "http://7xq7jw.com1.z0.glb.clouddn.com/n0S9qzkI.jpeg",
            "second": 3,
            "link": "http://www.baidu.com"
    }
}

获取通知-公告/好友请求

  • 地址： api/index/notice
  • 传参：无
  • 返回值：
参数名 参数值
announce 公告
friend_requests 添加好友请求
friend_strength 好友邀请加体力请求 
{
    "error_code": 0,
    "message": "请求成功",
    "data": {
        "announce": {
            "title": "游戏公告",
            "content": "两类关卡均有时间限制，后台可设置\r\n关卡通过标准：规定时间内100%完成答题\r\n关卡失败标准：超时未完成或者答题错误\r\n星级场每通过一个关卡获得一个星级奖励\r\n金币场每通过一个关卡获得不等金币奖励\r\n失败则需重新挑战，所有题目随机不重复\r\n",
            "link": "http://www.baidu.com",
            "create_time": 1481878081
        },
        "friend_requests": [
            {
                "uid": 1,
                "nickname": "nickname1",
                "avatar": "http://7xq7jw.com1.z0.glb.clouddn.com/n0S9qzkI.jpeg"
            },
            {
                "uid": 1,
                "nickname": "nickname1",
                "avatar": "http://7xq7jw.com1.z0.glb.clouddn.com/n0S9qzkI.jpeg"
            }
        ],
        "friend_strength": [
            {
                "uid": 1,
                "nickname": "nickname1",
                "avatar": "http://7xq7jw.com1.z0.glb.clouddn.com/n0S9qzkI.jpeg"
            },
            {
                "uid": 1,
                "nickname": "nickname1",
                "avatar": "http://7xq7jw.com1.z0.glb.clouddn.com/n0S9qzkI.jpeg"
            }
        ]
    }
}

用户手机号注册

  • 地址：api/user/reg
  • 传参：
参数名称含义
mobile用户手机号码
password 用户密码
  • 成功返回值：
{
    "error_code": 0,
    "message": "请求成功",
    "data": {
        "userInfo": {
            "uid": "121",
            "mobile": "18782960000",
            "nickname": "皮皮熊",
            "avatar": "http://7xq7jw.com1.z0.glb.clouddn.com/n0S9qzkI.jpeg",
            "rank": "土豪",
            "gold": 2000,
            "star": 100,
            "strength": 100
        },
        "token": "TsnKXtglprH8ybEOehJZLaDikB9d4qS1UWYQjGCo"
    }
}

登录

  • 地址：api/user/login
  • 传参：
参数名称含义
mobile用户手机号码
password用户密码
  • 成功返回值：
{
    "error_code": 0,
    "message": "请求成功",
    "data": {
        "userInfo": {
            "uid": "121",
            "mobile": "18782960000",
            "nickname": "皮皮熊",
            "avatar": "http://7xq7jw.com1.z0.glb.clouddn.com/n0S9qzkI.jpeg",
            "rank": "土豪",
            "gold": 2000,
            "star": 100,
            "strength": 100
        },
        "token": "TsnKXtglprH8ybEOehJZLaDikB9d4qS1UWYQjGCo"
    }
}

三方登录

  • 地址：api/user/thirdLogin
  • 传参：
参数名称含义
uuid用户uuid
avatar用户头像
nickname用户昵称
  • 成功返回值：
{
    "error_code": 0,
    "message": "请求成功",
    "data": {
        "userInfo": {
            "uid": "121",
            "mobile": "18782960000",
            "nickname": "皮皮熊",
            "avatar": "http://7xq7jw.com1.z0.glb.clouddn.com/n0S9qzkI.jpeg",
            "rank": "土豪",
            "gold": 2000,
            "star": 100,
            "strength": 100
        },
        "token": "TsnKXtglprH8ybEOehJZLaDikB9d4qS1UWYQjGCo"
    }
}

获取用户当前所持有的道具

  • 地址：api/user/getUserItems
  • 传参：
  • 成功返回值：

获取星级场列表

  • 地址：api/level/starlist
  • 传参：
  • 成功返回值：
参数名称含义
current_level用户当前所在等级
star_level_info.need_strength关卡所需体力
star_level_info.question_number关卡题目数量
star_level_info.time_limit关卡时间限制 
{
    "error_code": 0,
    "message": "请求成功",
    "data": {
        "current_level": 4,
        "star_level_info": [
            {
                "id": 1,
                "need_strength": 40,
                "question_number": 100,
                "time_limit": 1200
            },
            {
                "id": 2,
                "need_strength": 40,
                "question_number": 100,
                "time_limit": 1200
            },
            {
                "id": 3,
                "need_strength": 40,
                "question_number": 100,
                "time_limit": 1200
            },
            {
                "id": 4,
                "need_strength": 40,
                "question_number": 100,
                "time_limit": 1200
            },
            {
                "id": 5,
                "need_strength": 40,
                "question_number": 100,
                "time_limit": 1200
            },
            {
                "id": 6,
                "need_strength": 40,
                "question_number": 100,
                "time_limit": 1200
            },
            {
                "id": 7,
                "need_strength": 40,
                "question_number": 100,
                "time_limit": 1200
            },
            {
                "id": 8,
                "need_strength": 40,
                "question_number": 100,
                "time_limit": 1200
            },
            {
                "id": 9,
                "need_strength": 40,
                "question_number": 100,
                "time_limit": 1200
            },
            {
                "id": 10,
                "need_strength": 40,
                "question_number": 100,
                "time_limit": 1200
            }
        ]
    }
}

星级场题目详情

  • 地址：api/level/starDetail
  • 传参：
参数名称含义
star_id关卡ID
before_question_id上一道题目ID,默认为1
limit获取题目数量
  • 成功返回值：
参数名称含义
right_answer正确选项 0/1/2/3对应A/B/C/D 
{
    "error_code": 0,
    "message": "请求成功",
    "data": [
        {
            "id": 1,
            "question": "请在以下选择一个正确答案",
            "answer_options": [
                "选项A",
                "选项B",
                "选项C",
                "选项D"
            ],
            "right_answer": 0
        },
        {
            "id": 2,
            "question": "请在以下选择一个正确答案",
            "answer_options": [
                "选项A",
                "选项B",
                "选项C",
                "选项D"
            ],
            "right_answer": 1
        },
        {
            "id": 3,
            "question": "请在以下选择一个正确答案",
            "answer_options": [
                "选项A",
                "选项B",
                "选项C",
                "选项D"
            ],
            "right_answer": 2
        },
        {
            "id": 4,
            "question": "请在以下选择一个正确答案",
            "answer_options": [
                "选项A",
                "选项B",
                "选项C",
                "选项D"
            ],
            "right_answer": 3
        },
        {
            "id": 5,
            "question": "请在以下选择一个正确答案",
            "answer_options": [
                "选项A",
                "选项B",
                "选项C",
                "选项D"
            ],
            "right_answer": 0
        }
    ]
}

获取金币场列表

  • 地址：api/level/goldList
  • 传参：
  • 成功返回值：
参数名称含义
current_level用户当前所在等级
star_level_info.need_strength关卡所需体力
star_level_info.question_number关卡题目数量
star_level_info.time_limit关卡时间限制
star_level_info.reward通关奖励金币数量
star_level_info.challenge_times通关次数 
{
    "error_code": 0,
    "message": "请求成功",
    "data": {
        "current_level": 5,
        "star_level_info": [
            {
                "id": 1,
                "need_strength": 40,
                "question_number": 100,
                "time_limit": 1200,
                "reward": 2000,
                "challenge_times": 2
            },
            {
                "id": 2,
                "need_strength": 40,
                "question_number": 100,
                "time_limit": 1200,
                "reward": 2000,
                "challenge_times": 2
            },
            {
                "id": 3,
                "need_strength": 40,
                "question_number": 100,
                "time_limit": 1200,
                "reward": 2000,
                "challenge_times": 2
            },
            {
                "id": 4,
                "need_strength": 40,
                "question_number": 100,
                "time_limit": 1200,
                "reward": 2000,
                "challenge_times": 2
            },
            {
                "id": 5,
                "need_strength": 40,
                "question_number": 100,
                "time_limit": 1200,
                "reward": 2000,
                "challenge_times": 1
            },
            {
                "id": 6,
                "need_strength": 40,
                "question_number": 100,
                "time_limit": 1200,
                "reward": 2000,
                "challenge_times": 0
            },
            {
                "id": 7,
                "need_strength": 40,
                "question_number": 100,
                "time_limit": 1200,
                "reward": 2000,
                "challenge_times": 0
            },
            {
                "id": 8,
                "need_strength": 40,
                "question_number": 100,
                "time_limit": 1200,
                "reward": 2000,
                "challenge_times": 0
            },
            {
                "id": 9,
                "need_strength": 40,
                "question_number": 100,
                "time_limit": 1200,
                "reward": 2000,
                "challenge_times": 0
            },
            {
                "id": 10,
                "need_strength": 40,
                "question_number": 100,
                "time_limit": 1200,
                "reward": 2000,
                "challenge_times": 0
            }
        ]
    }
}

  • 地址：api/level/goldDetail
  • 传参：
参数名称含义
gold_id关卡ID
before_question_id上一道题目ID,默认为1
limit获取题目数量
  • 成功返回值：

right_answer正确选项 0/1/2/3对应A/B/C/D

道具商城

  • 地址：api/items/store
  • 传参：
  • 成功返回值：
{
    "error_code": 0,
    "message": "请求成功",
    "data": [
        {
            "id": 1,
            "title": "时间暂定卡",
            "need_gold": 10000,
            "already_have": 0
        },
        {
            "id": 1,
            "title": "延时挑战卡",
            "need_gold": 20000,
            "already_have": 2
        },
        {
            "id": 1,
            "title": "重复挑战卡",
            "need_gold": 30000,
            "already_have": 0
        }
    ]
}
